amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to alter contract no. GS-35F-4076D with respect to the location of data storage.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to alter contract no. GS-35F-4076D with respect to the location of data storage.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lipinski amendment (A061) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 254 (Roll no. 456).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lipinski amendment (A061) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 254 (Roll no. 456).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A061) offered by Mr. Lipinski.
